Package Classes.Order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
Classes.Order.Order
public class Order extends Object
The Order Class Contains information about the items ordered by a single Customer/Table.
Since:
2021-11-12

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(int tableID, Staff createdBy, boolean isMember)
      Constructor to create a new order with the given tableID and createdBy
      Parameters:
      tableID - The Table ID where the order was made
      createdBy - The name of the Staff who crated the order
      isMember - Flag value that checks whether order was made by a member to apply discount

  • Method Details

    • getSubTotal

      public double getSubTotal()
      Accessor for the subtotal for this order
      Returns:
      the subtotal price (after discount, before taxes)

    • getGrandTotal

      public double getGrandTotal()
      Accessor for the grand total for this order
      Returns:
      the grand total price (including discounts and taxes)

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem​(AMenuItem key, int quantity)
      Removes an item from this order
      Parameters:
      key - the specific AMenuItem we wish to remove
      quantity - the quantity of the item to remove

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(AMenuItem key, int quantity)
      Adds an item to this order
      Parameters:
      key - the specific AMenuItem we wish to add
      quantity - the quantity of the item to add

      public void updateOrder()
      Update the subTotal and grandTotal after adding/removing any items
